scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run build.native
scripts.test.android: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch && cd ../demo-angular && tns build android && tns test android --justlaunch
scripts.test.ios: npm run tsc && npm run tslint && cd ../demo && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch && cd ../demo-angular && tns build ios && tns test ios --justlaunch
scripts.demo.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo.reset: cd ../demo && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.demo-angular.ios: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run ios --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.android: npm run tsc && cd ../demo-angular && tns run android --syncAllFiles --emulator
scripts.demo-angular.reset: cd ../demo-angular && npx rimraf -- hooks node_modules platforms package-lock.json
scripts.plugin.prepare: npm run build && cd ../demo && tns plugin remove nativescript-stripe && tns plugin add ../src && cd ../demo-angular && tns plugin remove nativescript-stripe && tns plugin add ../src
scripts.clean: npm run demo.reset && npm run demo-angular.reset && npx rimraf -- node_modules package-lock.json && npm i
